snippet: The Obama administration is headed in the right direction as it puts the brakes on a massive gold and copper mine proposed for Alaska.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Obama administration announcement that it is putting the brakes on massive gold and copper mine proposed for the headwaters of Alaska's Bristol Bay; holds action sounds like a death knell for project, which is certain to become an environmental disaster and should not be allowed to go forward.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration is headed in the right direction as it puts the brakes on a massive gold and copper mine proposed for Alaska.
